title: Collecting and Analyzing Tumblr Data
text: Rtumblr wrapper official tumblr API. (existing CRAN package archived)

title: Collecting and Analyzing Tumblr Data
text: can install development version Rtumblr like :

title: Collecting and Analyzing Tumblr Data
text: need register app : https://www.tumblr.com/oauth/apps , create environment variable called “RTUMBLR_TOKEN” (instance .Renviron) consumer_key consumer_secret follows. environment variable RTUMBLR_TOKEN 123456789;abcdefghi

title: Collecting and Analyzing Tumblr Data
text: API endpoints work account. ones already implemented include: get_blog_blocks(): get list accounts blocked get_blog_likes(): get list posts liked get_blog_followers(): get followers get_blog_following(): get accounts follow Implemented endpoints work account : get_blog_avatar(): get avatar blog get_blog_info(): get general info blog get_blog_posts(): get posts blog get_posts_tag(): get posts specific tag. function return tibble (list tibble). get information columns, see official API documentation: https://www.tumblr.com/docs/en/api/v2

what: Retrieve a Blog Avatar You can get a blog's avatar in 9 different sizes — get_blog_avatar

title: Retrieve a Blog Avatar You can get a blog's avatar in 9 different sizes — get_blog_avatar

text: blog name blog size Integer. size avatar (square, one value length width). Must one values:  16, 24, 30, 40, 48, 64, 96, 128, 512

title: Retrieve a Blog Avatar You can get a blog's avatar in 9 different sizes — get_blog_avatar
text: png avatar

title: Retrieve a Blog Avatar You can get a blog's avatar in 9 different sizes — get_blog_avatar
Retrieve Blogs Blocks — get_blog_blocks
text: Get blogs requested blog currently blocking. requesting user must admin blog retrieve list.  Note endpoint rate limited 60 requests per minute.

title: Retrieve Blogs Blocks — get_blog_blocks
text: blog name blog limit number blocks retrieve (1-20) offset block number start (default 0) app_credentials named list containing consumer key consumer secret. NULL, attempts load env variable

title: Retrieve Blogs Blocks — get_blog_blocks
text: tibble blocked blogs

title: Retrieve Blogs Blocks — get_blog_blocks
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # replace "your-blog-name" with your Tumblr username get_blog_blocks(blog = "your-blog-name") } # }

text: blog name blog limit number results return: 1–50 offset post index start app_credentials named list containing consumer key consumer secret. NULL, attempts load env variable ... parameters described : https://www.tumblr.com/docs/en/api/v2
